messageBody:
re - introduction to JUNIT for beginner (pls let me have a feed back)

13)     public static Test suite()
14)     {
15)             TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
16)             suite.addTest(new OwnTest("hnhan")); // ***
17)             return suite;
18)     }

To avoid the problem with spelling, use the TestSuite contructor that takes a class reference -- that will run all methods whose names start with "test".

16)             suite.addTest( OwnTest.class );
